name: Cubic (itch) (Karl Theodor Ruby)
description:
Cubic Gameplay

What to do:

Eat the pink cubes to gain points. Touch a golden bomb and all pink cubes will be cleared from the level.

What to avoid:

Let the pink cubes reach the backwall and you're dead.

Touch the walls and you're dead.

Hit any of the black cubes... And guess what...

Yes, you're dead.

Controls
  • F11 to enter/exit fullscreen.
  • Arrow keys for movement.
  • Left click to start/restart.
